mapper.select: select app.app_id, app.app_name, app.app_type, app.svc_category_id, ver.version_id, ver.app_version, ver.description ver.version_info, ver.keyword, ver.copyright, ver.link_man ver.mobile, ver.address, file.file_url from (select * from cidev_application where app_id in (select app_id from cidev_recommend_apps) and app_type = #{appType}) app join (select * from cidev_application_version where is_onlined_version = 0) ver on app.app_id = ver.app_id join cidev_base_files_assoc fileass on ver.version_id = fileass.version_id and fileass.file_type = 0 join cibase_files file on fileass.file_id = file.file_id

select app.app_id, app.app_name, app.app_type, app.svc_category_id, ver.version_id, ver.app_version, ver.description ver.version_info, ver.keyword, ver.copyright, ver.link_man ver.mobile, ver.address, file.file_url from (select * from cidev_application where app_type = #{appType} and is_onlined = 0) app join (select * from cidev_application_version where is_onlined_version = 0) ver on app.app_id = ver.app_id join cidev_base_files_assoc fileass on ver.version_id = fileass.version_id and fileass.file_type = 0 join cibase_files file on fileass.file_id = file.file_id

select app.app_id, app.app_name, app.app_type, app.svc_category_id, app.created_at, ver.version_id, ver.app_version, ver.description ver.version_info, ver.keyword, ver.copyright, ver.link_man ver.mobile, ver.address from (select * from cidev_application where app_id = #{appId}) app join (select * from cidev_application_version where is_onlined_version = 0 and app_id = #{appId}) ver on app.app_id = ver.app_id

select assoc.file_id, assoc.file_name, assoc.file_path, assoc.file_size , assoc.file_suffix, assoc.file_content_type, assoc.file_url , assoc.created_by, assoc.created_at, file.file_type, file.file_seq from (select * from cidev_base_files_assoc where version_id = #{versionId}) assoc join cibase_files file on assoc.file_id = file.file_id order by assoc.file_type, assoc.file_seq
